title: Levene’s Test Calculator – Homogeneity of Variances (F test)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: H_A: \text{at least two group variances differ.}
formulas.raw: H_A: \text{at least two group variances differ.}

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \[ H_0: \sigma_1^2 = \sigma_2^2 = \dots = \sigma_k^2 \] \[ H_A: \text{at least two group variances differ.} \]

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Between-group sum of squares: \[ SS_B = \sum_{i=1}^k n_i(\bar{Z}_i - \bar{Z})^2 \] Within-group sum of squares: \[ SS_W = \sum_{i=1}^k \sum_{j=1}^{n_i} (Z_{ij} - \bar{Z}_i)^2 \] Degrees of freedom: \[ df_B = k - 1, \qquad df_W = N - k \] Mean squares and Levene’s F statistic: \[ MS_B = \frac{SS_B}{df_B}, \quad MS_W = \frac{SS_W}{df_W}, \quad F = \frac{MS_B}{MS_W}. \]

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
